create_power_loader.ponder.empty_chunk_l: Right-click a Ghast with an empty chunk loader to capture it
With rotational power, the captured ghasts light up the portal cores...
create_power_loader.ponder.andesite_chun: Basic Usage of the Andesite Chunk Loader
The chunk loader keeps the current chunk loaded when given rotational power
It does not work when the rotation speed is too slow
Redstone and the Andesite Chunk Loader
The chunk loader gives comparator output when it is active
When rotational power is lost, there is a short delay (configurable) before the chunk is unloaded
The chunk will stay loaded if power is restored during this delay
create_power_loader.ponder.brass_chunk_l: Basic Usage of the Brass Chunk Loader
The chunk loader keeps the current chunk loaded when given rotational power
It does not work when the rotation speed is too slow
You can configure the loaded range through the value panel...
...but a longer range requires a higher rotation speed
Redstone and the Brass Chunk Loader
The chunk loader gives comparator output when it is active
When rotational power is lost, there is a short delay (configurable) before the chunks are unloaded
The chunks will stay loaded if power is restored during this delay
Loading Chunks Around Moving Contraptions
Brass chunk loaders also work on contraptions
They always load a 3×3 chunk area around the contraption
When assembled, they do not require rotational power to function
They also function on stationary contraptions
Loading Chunks For Train Stations
Brass chunk loaders can attach to Train Stations
Place them next to Train Stations in the correct direction
They do not require rotational power, but are normally inactive
When a train arrives at the station, a 3×3 area around the chunk loader is loaded
When the train leaves, the area is unloaded again
